mapper.insert: insert into ty_user (uid, username, pwd, role, company, phone, name) value (#{uid}, #{username}, #{pwd}, #{role}, #{company}, #{phone}, #{name})
mapper.select: select u.uid from ty_user u where u.username = #{username}
select u.uid, u.username, u.role, u.company, u.phone, u.name from ty_user u where u.uid = #{uid}
select u.uid from ty_user u where u.username = #{username} and u.pwd = #{pwd}
select company_id companyId, company_name companyName from ty_company
select company_name from ty_company where company_id=#{id}
